Cybersecurity Essentials Course

Course Overview

TechSecure Institute offers a 12-week "Cybersecurity Essentials" course tailored for undergraduate students, blending foundational programming, web security, and practical defense skills. This course builds on C programming basics, web development (HTML/CSS/JS), and hands-on projects such as secure login systems or asset trackers.
